flow.descriptionCdata:
2ba653f5-3432-44c4-81f7-192667cfabbf.41114265-9a01-4f3d-8e63-deadb4c271f7.description=717f2f1f-519d-48c2-9a51-20ce31b6851a.38cc6cc1-1a71-4fd0-bb9a-d04a8035f60b.description 2ba653f5-3432-44c4-81f7-192667cfabbf.81e072cd-6f12-4b7c-9f5b-807b71660569.description=717f2f1f-519d-48c2-9a51-20ce31b6851a.e87121be-02ff-4b91-880f-5876b8ddbeca.description 2ba653f5-3432-44c4-81f7-192667cfabbf.8a87de33-e471-49ba-9202-c81319dcca78.description=717f2f1f-519d-48c2-9a51-20ce31b6851a.596312d1-458d-46d9-b3fc-4e942645eb71.description 2ba653f5-3432-44c4-81f7-192667cfabbf.bff9a82b-5719-4af9-8c54-f1dafab8efd7.description=Purpose\: Gather parameters required to drop a MySQL database. Inputs\: command - executes GatherAdvancedParametersforMySQLDropDatabase.py MySQL Password - Optional\: This password is for the specified MySQL user. This is valid only if used in conjunction with the MySQL user. MySQL Unix User - Optional\: The Unix user who owns the MySQL daemon. MySQL Username - Optional\: The username for the MySQL user. This is not required if ".my.cnf" file is configured for the instance user. Instance.os user - No description Server.Become Routine - No description host - Target to run this command against password - Login information for host username - Login information for host protocol - ssh/wmi timeout - Time (ms) before auto-exit\: use ${ExtendedTimeout} to lengthen. Results\: Instance Wrapper - The call wrapper with which the step code will be executed. mysqlpass - The password for the specified MySQL user. This is valid only if used in conjunction with the MySQL user. mysqluser - The username for the MySQL database. Exit Code - Exit code of the step needed for branching. 2ba653f5-3432-44c4-81f7-192667cfabbf.d7b4091c-f953-4266-bdf9-521a42efa5f4.description=717f2f1f-519d-48c2-9a51-20ce31b6851a.c2079ae3-68de-403d-96b6-4245a1a48434.description 2ba653f5-3432-44c4-81f7-192667cfabbf.description=
 Usage instructions

Purpose of this workflow is to drop a MySQL database and to remove it from the environment


 Dependencies

An existing MySQL database must be used as the target database.


 Results verification

Within mysql program, enter command "show databases;" to display a list of databases, which should now exclude the recently dropped database
 Required Inputs

    Server Target - The desired target to run this flow against.
    Server Target Username - The user to login to the Server Target as.
    Server Target Password - The password to login as the Server Target Username.
    Download Source Host - The target host where the files needed for this flow can be downloaded from.
    Download Source Path - The path to where the files can be found on the Download Source Host.
    Database Name - Name of the database which needs to be removed from the DMA environment.
    Database.Name - No description
    Instance Name - Name of the instance to which the database (the one that is to be deleted from the DMA environment) belongs to.

 Optional Inputs

    Clean Code Base - Remove code base from target after execution (True || False).
    Clean JRE - Remove JRE from target after execution (True || False).
    Debug Level - Set level of output [(least) 1-5 (most)]
    MySQL Password - Optional\: This password is for the specified MySQL user. This is valid only if used in conjunction with the MySQL user.
    MySQL Username - Optional\: The username for the MySQL user. This is not required if ".my.cnf" file is configured for the instance user.
    MySQL Unix User - Optional\: The Unix user who owns the MySQL daemon.
    Instance.os user - No description
    Server.Become Routine - No description
2ba653f5-3432-44c4-81f7-192667cfabbf.f7bc79dd-8c4d-433e-8b08-84defde39ff5.description=Purpose\: Drop the target MySQL database Description\: Drops the database. Return Codes\: If all parameters are valid, the step returns a 0, else the step returns a 1. DMA Function Libs Imports\: import steplog import pythontools import parametertools Inputs\: command - executes MySQLDropDatabase.py Instance Wrapper - No description MySQL Password - No description MySQL User - No description Database.Name - No description host - Target to run this command against password - Login information for host username - Login information for host protocol - ssh/wmi timeout - Time (ms) before auto-exit\: use ${ExtendedTimeout} to lengthen. Results\: Exit Code - Exit code of the step needed for branching.
flow.name: MySQL - Drop Database V2

staticBinding.value: ${openArgs}Instance Wrapper=${instanceWrapper};;MySQL Password=${mysqlpass};;MySQL User=${mysqluser};;Database.Name=${databaseTarget};;Debug Level=${debugLevel};;Server Target=${serverTarget};;Instance Target=${instanceTarget};;Database Target=${databaseTarget}${closeArgs}

step.name: Gather Advanced Parameters for MySQL Drop Database
step.resultContextKey: Gather Advanced Parameters for MySQL Drop Database

staticBinding.value: ${openArgs}MySQL Password=${mySQLPassword};;MySQL Unix User=${mySQLUnixUser};;MySQL Username=${mySQLUsername};;Instance.os user=${instance.osUser};;Server.Become Routine=${server.BecomeRoutine};;Debug Level=${debugLevel};;Server Target=${serverTarget};;Instance Target=${instanceTarget};;Database Target=${databaseTarget}${closeArgs}
